name: FraudService
description:
This service searches for potentially fraudulent transactions by calculating the total value of orders for a customer within a time period, then checks to see if this is over a configured limit. 

[GitHub](https://github.com/confluentinc/solace-streams-examples/blob/5.0.0-post/src/main/java/io/confluent/examples/streams/microservices/FraudService.java)
